listitem.para: POLYSTART tells MSWLogo that you are about to define a polygon. Each subsequent move will result in the destination coordinate being added as a vertex to the polygon. The definition is completed by issuing the command POLYEND. To view ALL defined polygons as shaded polygons you must issue the command POLYVIEW. Make sure you understand the Polygon Restrictions.

programlisting.userinput:
TO SQUARE POLYSTART REPEAT 4 [FORWARD 100 RIGHT 90] POLYEND END
PERSPECTIVE REPEAT 72 [SQUARE ROLLRIGHT 5] POLYVIEW
